title: The rarest of Pepes
author: VD
content_html: That’s one hell of a collector’s item. Give him credit for being a good sport about it. And score one for the Dread Ilk, who are everywhere.
content_text:
That’s one hell of a collector’s item. Give him credit for being a good sport about it. And score one for the Dread Ilk,
who are everywhere
.
